name: Pokore
description:
Pokore is a 3D survival game in first person view, made for casual gamers.

In the year 2401, Humans have exhausted the last resources of the Earth and want the Ao planet for its mana. You embody Poko, the last representative of the  Koris. Alone, you must fight the invaders and have to survive as long as possible.

POKO

The last protector of the Mana, a magical aura emanates from him...
What do the engravings on his left arm mean? Could it be special skills?

ENEMY DRONES

The Pathfinder (white one) and the Cleaner (dark blue one) are drones made by Humans to collect Ao mana. You must get back what they stole from you!
Beware, their blue light is harmful to you and be careful, Cleaners seem to have a longer firing range than Pathfinders.

CONTROLS KEYBOARD AND MOUSE



Key bindings: you can choose between Azerty and Qwerty profile.


GAMEPAD*

Special thanks to Maximilien who allowed you to play in game with a gamepad!

* Keep in mind that the game was primarily designed for keyboard and mouse, notice that joystick controls aren't available in menus. CREDITS

This project was produced in 2 months, from April to May 2020, by students of Créajeux.
